price: 104. Qu’il y ait donc parmi vous une communauté qui appelle au bien, qui prescrit le convenable et proscrit le condamnable. Ceux-là atteindront à la réussite.
arabic: وَلۡتَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أُمَّةٞ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waltakun minkum ummatun yadʿūna ilā al-khayri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
